Subject: Offline Update for server 5.9.1.0
Description:
Hello,

We have been unable to update our server using live update due to a new firewall being installed. As we are working through getting our new firewall rules in place, until we are able to restore the connection to EPP Live Update, can we have an offline update to get our server to the latest version from 5.9.1.0 including the latest hotfix for ADV-2024-002?
